mods.note: Sanctus Benedictus, Agnus Dei was written for Thornton's wedding to Alice Dutcher and was first performed for that occasion in Grand Rapids, Michigan. This recording is of the Margarite B. Parker Chapel Choir (soprano, alto, tenor, bass) with John Casey, conductor. Contents: there are several takes of each movement--Sanctus Benedictus: take 1 (begins at :00)--take 2 (begins at 1:13). Agnus Dei several takes (begins at 2:05)--take all the way through (begins at 3:22)--another take all the way through (begins at 5:24)
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
Physical rights and copyright are retained by the LSU Libraries. Permission to reproduce or publish must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: William J. Thornton Papers, Mss. 2012, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.
